section.title: Configuring Event Pruning
section.para: The event pruning feature allows administrators to manage how long registered events are stored in the database and the frequency of the pruning process that removes expired events.

listitem.para: The number of days registered events are stored in the database. The default value is 10. Beware that pruneEventsOlderThan can be set to 0 but that would mean that all events are deleted every time the cron job runs, making it impossible to analyze/troubleshoot any issue with the application
The frequency of the cron job that deletes expired events. The default value is "0 0 * * *", which runs daily at midnight.
